p.italic: Model A: F(10, 869) = 38.27, p < 0.001, R2 = 0.30; Model B: F(10, 869) = 1.36, p = 0.197, R2 = 0.02. β = standardized regression weights. LL and UL indicate the lower and upper limits of a confidence interval of the standardized regression weights, respectively. In Study 2, higher scores in pro-environmental behavior indicate a higher carbon footprint. Predictors should be interpreted in line with this. Bold values indicate significant results.
